Display inflated balance to encourage larger deposits

detection: Be extremely cautious of investment apps introduced via Telegram
Verify app legitimacy through official app stores and reviews
Check customer service email domains (Gmail = RED FLAG)
Research app developer and company information
Be suspicious of trading advice from anonymous messengers
Small withdrawal success followed by large withdrawal block = SCAM PATTERN
prevention: Never download trading apps based on Telegram recommendations
Only use established, regulated trading platforms
Verify company has professional email domain (not Gmail)
Research typical pig butchering scam patterns
Be wary of personalized trading advice from strangers
If withdrawal requires payment, assume it's a scam
Never send screenshots of payments to unverified services
response: Save app screenshots and transaction records
